text: Stephen Courtney Makanaka Bhasera (born ) is a Zimbabwean rugby union player playing in South Africa for the in the Currie Cup and the in the Rugby Challenge. His regular position is prop. ==References== Category:Zimbabwean rugby union players Category:Living people Category:1996 births Category:Sportspeople from Harare Category:Rugby union props Category:Golden Lions players
title: Stephen Bhasera
